participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and introspective, enjoys exploring nature and understanding human behavior.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.
